column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I made sure I had my library card with me before I went to the library .
#text=Then , I looked on the computers for a book I liked .
#text=I was n't able to find one that well , so I asked a librarian for advice .
#text=She also looked in the catalog and asked me about what I wanted so she could suggest more options .
#text=Finally , I found a book I liked .
#text=I told the librarian I wanted that one , and she wrote down the title , author , and dewey decimal number .
#text=We went along the bookshelves until we found the correct number range , then started searching the shelves by the author 's last name .
#text=I found the book and took it to the counter .
#text=The librarian scanned the book and my card and said I would have to return it in 3 weeks .
#text=I thanked her and noted the due date down on my calendar .
